title: Real estate valuation 2
overview: Real estate valuation 2 continues to provide knowledge about real estate valuation, introducing 3 valuation methods (capitalization/income method, residual method, and profit method); land valuation; content and techniques for preparing real estate valuation reports.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Understand the structure and requirements of a valuation report, the process of specific valuation tasks with learned methods
Have the ability to organize and implement a specific real estate valuation task according to the methods learned in the course
Have the ability to present and defend personal views in the field of real estate valuation
